verses.roman:
ei-mata madhure saba bhāva-samāhāra
ataeva āsvādādhikye kare camatkāra

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; madhure—on the platform of conjugal love; saba—all; bhāva-samāhāra—amalgamation of the feelings; ataeva—therefore; āsvāda-adhikye—from the increase of tasting by the devotees; kare camatkāra—is certainly wonderful.
translation: "Similarly, on the platform of conjugal love, all the feelings of the devotees are amalgamated. The intensified taste is certainly wonderful."
